00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <cstdint>
00012 #include <new>
00013 #include <cassert>
00014 #include <limits>
00015 #include <new>
00016 
00017 namespace hope::memory{
00018 
00026     struct chunk final{
00027 
00037             void init(std::size_t block_size, uint8_t blocks_count) noexcept;
00038 
00046             [[nodiscard]] void* allocate(std::size_t block_size) noexcept;
00047 
00054             void deallocate(void* ptr, std::size_t block_size) noexcept;
00055 
00063             [[nodiscard]] bool is_deallocation_valid(void* ptr, std::size_t block_size) const noexcept;
00064 
00070             [[nodiscard]] bool is_allocation_valid(std::size_t block_size) const noexcept;
00071 
00072         uint8_t*    data{ nullptr };        // Pointer to thr very beginning of the memory pool
00073         uint8_t     free_blocks_count{ 0 }; // Count of currently available blocks count, variables type is linked with alignment and other complicated things
00074         uint8_t     first_free_block{ 0 };  // Position of first available block
00075     };
00076 
00077     inline void chunk::init(std::size_t block_size, uint8_t blocks_count) noexcept {
00078         data = new(std::nothrow) uint8_t[block_size * std::size_t(blocks_count)];
00079         assert(data != nullptr);
00080         free_blocks_count = blocks_count;
00081         auto* begin = data;
00082         for (uint8_t i{ 0 }; i < blocks_count; ++i, begin += block_size)
00083             *begin = i + 1;
00084     }
00085 
00086     inline void* chunk::allocate(std::size_t block_size) noexcept {
00087         assert(is_allocation_valid(block_size));
00088         auto* const result = data + std::size_t(first_free_block) * block_size;
00089         first_free_block = *result;
00090         --free_blocks_count;
00091         return result;
00092     }
00093 
00094     inline void chunk::deallocate(void* ptr, std::size_t block_size) noexcept {
00095         assert(is_deallocation_valid(ptr, block_size));
00096         const auto byte_index = std::size_t(static_cast<uint8_t*>(ptr) - data);
00097         const auto block_index = uint8_t(byte_index / block_size);
00098         data[byte_index] = first_free_block;
00099         first_free_block = block_index;
00100         ++free_blocks_count;
00101     }
00102 
00103     inline bool chunk::is_deallocation_valid(void* ptr, std::size_t block_size) const noexcept {
00104         return data != nullptr
00105             && ptr != nullptr
00106             && free_blocks_count < std::numeric_limits<uint8_t>::max()
00107             && block_size > 0
00108             && (static_cast<uint8_t*>(ptr) - data) % block_size == 0;
00109     }
00110 
00111     inline bool chunk::is_allocation_valid(std::size_t block_size) const noexcept {
00112         return data != nullptr
00113             && free_blocks_count > 0
00114             && block_size > 0;
00115     }
00116 }
